paragraphs: Photographed by John Edmonds, Vogue, September 2020

There’s nothing better than slipping into a cashmere sweater on a chilly fall morning or winter day. It is sweater weather, after all! Their soothing softness might be the extra dose of comfort you need right now, whether you’re layering up for outdoor dining or adding another cozy piece to your stay-home wardrobe. And while the best cashmere sweaters have a reputation for having a high price tag, direct-to-consumer brands and styles made from recycled cashmere have given the covetable piece a more approachable price point, starting at just $75.

What’s more, we’ve pulled together a handful of stylish sweaters to invest in. This mix of classic silhouettes will stay fresh season after season and includes turtlenecks, crews, and V-necks in shades ranging from camel and heather gray to black, navy, and pale pastels. As a classic cashmere sweater is endlessly versatile, all would pair well with jeans, leggings, skirts, and trousers. Whether you’re prepping for a winter spent hibernating, searching for a tried-and-true holiday gift idea for a loved one, or simply looking to update your own closet, here are 17 of the best cashmere sweaters to consider that are as cozy as they are chic.
